Schedule

Friday, September 27th

Rehearsal, Rehearsal Dinner, Cocktails

More Details

Rehearsal
5:00 PM
Montague House
The Wedding Party should plan to be at the Montague House on Friday, September 27, at 5:00 PM, for the Rehearsal.
Rehearsal Dinner
6:00 PM
Criollo Restaurant
Hotel Monteleone
Following the Rehearsal, the Wedding Party and their guests are invited to a Rehearsal Dinner at 6:00 PM at Criollo Restaurant in the Hotel Monteleone.
Cocktails
9:00 PM
Carousel Bar
Hotel Monteleone
Everyone is invited to join us at the Carousel Bar in the Monteleone around 9:00 PM for drinks from the cash bar and entertainment provided by a live jazz band.

Saturday, September 28th

Ceremony, Reception, After Party

More Details

The Ceremony
6:30 PM
Montague House
The Ceremony will begin promptly at 6:30 PM on Saturday, September 28th, at the Montague House in the French Quarter. Please arrive a few minutes early and enjoy a cocktail as you wait for the pomp to begin.
Reception
Montegue House
Once weâ€™ve made it official, the Reception will commence with catering by Chef John Folse, entertainment by Johnny Sketch and the Dirty Notes, and an open bar. We will wrap up the the Reception around 10:00 PM.
After Party
10:00 PM
Hotel Provincial
After the Reception, please join us in the Hotel Provincial courtyard and pool area for an After Party with an open bar and late-night snacks.
Designed by the best man.
